metadata.title: CVE-2014-3462 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - high
metadata.description:
The ".encfs6.xml" configuration file in encfs before 1.7.5 allows remoteattackers to access sensitive data by setting "blockMACBytes" to 0 andadding 8 to "blockMACRandBytes".

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-3462` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

encfs - 1.8.1-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: encfs package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.1-3').
